name: WordpressforBroadcasters
0:
”Alexa, ask WPB for headlines”
”Alexa, ask WPB for live stream”
”Alexa, ask WPB to play the news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. p. b.
des: The Wordpress for Broadcasters skill enables the alexa to access feeds from the WPB website and read them out to you. You can also listen to the music stream. It gives you the headlines of the top 5 posts from the WPB website.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
